game.name: Crystal Ball Critters
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Crystal Ball Critters is a multiplayer ball-racing game, in which you race your friends through our evil mastermind's carefully thought out multiverse of adventures! Play by yourself or against up to 4 of your friends to find out who can beat each stage first.
